    • login

      public Optional<Long> login(String email, String password) throws ConnectionToDatabaseException
      Checks if the user with the given email exists in the database If the user exists, checks if the password hash matches the one in the database
      Parameters:
      email - - email of the user
      password - - password of the user
      Returns:
      - id of the user if the login is successful, empty optional otherwise
      Throws:
      ConnectionToDatabaseException - - If there is an error while connecting to the database

    • update

      public Boolean update(User user) throws ConnectionToDatabaseException
      Updates the user in the database
      Parameters:
      user - - user to update
      Returns:
      - true if the user was updated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      ConnectionToDatabaseException - - If there is an error while connecting to the database
